scripts.copy:less: npm run copy:baseFunctions && npm run copy:baseVariables
scripts.react:config: npm run lint && npm run less
scripts.react:start:stg: npm run react:config && cross-env REACT_APP_NODE_SERVER=http://cpu-244.famo.pt:9070/ react-scripts start
scripts.react:build:dev: npm run react:config && cross-env REACT_APP_NODE_SERVER=http://localhost:9070/ react-scripts build
scripts.react:build:stg: npm run react:config && cross-env REACT_APP_NODE_SERVER=http://cpu-244.famo.pt:9070/ react-scripts build
scripts.build:cordova:dev: npm run react:build:dev && npm run delete:cordova && npm run copy:cordova
scripts.build:cordova:stg: npm run react:build:stg && npm run delete:cordova && npm run copy:cordova
scripts.build:cordova: npm run react:build && npm run delete:cordova && npm run copy:cordova
scripts.build:cordova:android: npm run build:cordova:stg && cd ../cordova && cordova run android
scripts.build:cordova:android:release: npm run build:cordova && cd ../cordova && cordova build android --release -- --keystore=famo-keystore.jks --storePassword=tiFamo112 --alias=famo_key --password=tiFamo112
scripts.build:cordova:browser: npm run build:cordova:dev && cd ../cordova && cordova run browser
